title: Don't You Feel Well, Sam?
description: "This follow-up to the best-selling  Kiss Good Night  will comfort little ones like a cozy blanket that’s tucked in just right." —  Booklist  (starred review)In the little white house, Mrs. Bear is putting Sam to bed, when suddenly — HCK HCK! coughs Sam. Mrs. Bear gets some syrup. But the syrup tastes bad, and there’s too much of it on a too-big spoon, and it’s too hard to swallow. What will make Sam feel better? Acclaimed picture-book creators Amy Hest and Anita Jeram revisit Sam and Mrs. Bear as they share a quiet moment of comfort that is enough to conquer the coldest night.
author: Amy Hest
